The section will be updated after you successfully request to redeem your Gold Gift. By doing so, you will also initiate the creation of the NFT for ! \n\nIf you have any queries or feedback about our NFT X Gold campaign or Open, please contact your relationship manager, or leave a message in our Help center

Your request to redeem your Gold Gift and initiate the creation of an NFT for is confirmed. You will be contacted soon to arrange delivery of your Gold Gift. \n\nIf you have any questions, please contact your relationship manager.
NFTs – or Non-Fungible Tokens – are unique digital assets stored on a blockchain…

NFTs – or Non-Fungible Tokens – are unique digital assets stored on a blockchain. They are designed to be unique and cannot be exchanged for another equivalent, unlike crypto-assets like Bitcoin or Central Bank Digital Currencies. 

The NFTs can be used to represent distinct goods, such as a land title deed or a particular piece of artwork. They can be digital proof of ownership or authenticity and can even provide transferability when a physical good/service is not as easily transferable. 

For this Open campaign, the NFT does not represent ownership of any good or service and is non-tradable, meaning you will not be able to use or sell it on a crypto exchange. 

However, you will learn more about NFTs and Web 3.0 and will play a role in ’s creation of an NFT while you redeem your Gold Gift.

Exclusive for you, by - Gold means wealth as permanence, and a gift for all time to be passed down. Gold is the gift that is not forgotten, but rather becomes the heritage that lasts forever. Gold is the gift with a meaning all its own.
If you have any questions, please contact your relationship manager.

has been developing and deploying some of the industry’s most advanced and innovative technology to make customers’ banking experience easier and more secure. 

One technology that has gained traction recently is the use of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). These are digital assets that allow the recording and assigning of ownership on “public ledgers – often known as the blockchain”. 

In addition to having applications in financial securities and real-world assets such as property, NFTs have gained popularity as a means of trading digital artwork and other forms of intellectual property.

Over the next two weeks, we hope you will learn more about NFT ownership and experience our beta digital wallet solution called “ Open Staff”, and get a chance to win one of 1,000 commemorative tokens. Our very own NFTs is specially-designed to reflect our heritage and our Asia-Pacific network.
Follow the on-screen instructions to register and log in to the app.
Complete all three quizzes in the app to enter the lucky draw.

Piece of Internationalism - Part of Project 1865, September 2022. 

Your very own NFTs is inspired by the Banks Heritage across our Asia-Pacific network. 

Your NFT encompasses: 

	1. One of our lions (either Stephen or Stitt). 

	2. An iconic object associated with one of our Asia-Pacific markets. 

	3. An element represent our Asia Wealth strategy and ambitions. 

 has been developing and deploying some of the industry’s most advanced and innovative technology to make customers’ banking experience easier and more secure. 

This NFT is non-tradable and non-transferrable and have no present or future value. Please refer to the Campaign Terms and Conditions for more information about the NFT.

Personal Internet Banking Terms and Conditions

This Agreement between you and Bank USA, N.A. (“”) governs the use of Personal Internet Banking services. These services permit enrolled customers to perform a number of banking functions online through the use of a personal computer or, for some functions, a mobile device on accounts linked to the service, including some accounts with our affiliates, such as Securities (USA) Inc. (“ Securities”). Unless indicated otherwise by the context, “linked accounts” or “linked accounts” refers to all of your accounts with or its affiliates that you have linked to Personal Internet Banking.\n\nWhen you use any of the Personal Internet Banking services described in this Agreement, or authorize others to use them, you agree to the terms and conditions of the entire Agreement. Your use of online banking services may also be affected by the agreements between us for your linked accounts. You should review those agreements for any applicable fees, for limitations on the number of transactions you can make, and for other restrictions that might impact your use of an account with online banking services. In addition, your use of online banking services is affected by our Website Terms and Conditions, which terms are incorporated here by reference and made a part of this Agreement.
